column1: We have been reaching out to manufacturers as part of our approach to identifying potential disruptions or shortages.
V-safe is a voluntary smartphone-based tool that uses text messaging and web surveys to check in with people who have been vaccinated to identify potential side effects after COVID-19 vaccination.
